feedback: The prompt effectively captures the luxurious aesthetic with detailed descriptions of materials, lighting, and camera movements that highlight the craftsmanship and opulence of the jewelry. It aligns well with the original concept, emphasizing texture, color, and elegance in a high-fidelity, cinematic style. Minor improvements could include additional specifics about the environment to reinforce cultural richness and a mention of jewelry display context (e.g., on a regal stand or model) for enhanced visual storytelling.
critique_points: Add more environmental details to emphasize cultural opulence beyond the ethereal and warm tones.
Specify the jewelry display method (e.g., styled on a model, ornate stand) to aid visualization.
Include mention of the overall composition framing to ensure clarity for AI rendering.
